game.name: Constellar
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 난이도 조정, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A reinterpretation of retro games like Space Invaders and Galaga with a modern twist. Battle through planetary sectors using elemental abilities that combine for powerful effects and make bosses vanish. If you’re looking for a short, modernized retro-style game, this is perfect for you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A reinterpretation of retro games like Space Invaders and Galaga with a modern twist. If you’re looking for a short, modernized retro-style game, this is perfect for you.
